name: Towny
description:
Towny is a small town building project for the Trijam 169 (nice)

BEFORE PLAYING

This game aims to  show the problem that arises when having lots of people live in a town.  Its harder to make everyone happy you need more space for them , more food etc.

Grouping buildings together will increase their effectiveness. This means build  a circus in the middle of a group of houses will make the folks around it happier.  

On the other hand when placing 10 circuses to close to each other they wont be so effective.

You lose when you run out of food, produced food will be eatable for a week afterwards it will  be inedible.

The goal is to reach 10.000 folks and a happiness of 100%.

Keep in mind your  folks  will leave when the happpiness is to low.

If you need to cheat money you can press the "M" Key to get 5000Gold.

If you want to restart press the "R" Key

Buildings have 4 factors the most important factor decides their color

  • Blue Housing Space
  • Green Food making
  • Orange Money making
  • Pink Happiness Boost

Assets we used

Buildings and co https://2minutetabletop.com/product/wonderdraft-map-icons/

We made the game a bit easier in the last few minutes, it's easier to get happiness now !
